service_alerts.subject: Atlanta, Chicago, Miami, Silicon Valley, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo Network Outage

entries.message: The issue has been resolved and all services are expected to be fully operational at this time.

We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Atlanta, Chicago, Miami, Silicon Valley, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo locations. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

service_alerts.subject: Atlanta, Chicago, Miami, Silicon Valley, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo Network Outage

entries.message: The issue has been resolved and all services are expected to be fully operational at this time.

We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Atlanta, Chicago, Miami, Silicon Valley, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo locations. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Infrastructure Upgrade

We will be performing infrastructure upgrades in our Sydney location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment.

Start Time: 2022-05-19 15:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-05-19 19:00:00 UTC

During this time, the following will be affected:

• Bare Metal deploys will be disabled while maintenance is ongoing.
• Server power actions and VNC console access may be affected.

Previously deployed servers in Sydney will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Event Type: Infrastructure Maintenance
Start Time: 2022-05-17 15:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-05-17 19:00:00 UTC

We will be performing infrastructure upgrades in our Dallas location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment.

During this time, the following will be affected:

• Bare Metal deploys will be disabled while maintenance is ongoing.
• Server power actions and VNC console access may be affected.

Previously deployed servers in Dallas will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
